title: Write the release-trailing playbook
description: Write a maintainer-facing playbook for release trailing: choose candidate, run snapshot diff, run validation matrix, decide wrap/unwrapped, update pointers, and ship a wrapper release with notes.

title: Define cadence and ownership model
description: Define how quickly we trail upstream releases, what “stale” means, who owns updates, and how Release Watch alerts route to maintainers.

title: Trial run plan (0.61.0 → 0.77.0)
description: Write an explicit trial run plan to validate the process end-to-end using the repo-pinned 0.61.0 binary and the locally available 0.77.0 binary on Linux.
